vdb.name: StockMat
vdb.description: Shows how to materialize into an Infinispan remote cache

model.name: StockJDGSource
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE StockCache (product_id integer PRIMARY KEY, symbol string(10), price double, company_name string(100) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE true, "teiid_ispn:cache" 'stockCache');

model.name: StocksMatView
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Stock ( product_id integer, symbol string, price double, company_name string) OPTIONS (MATERIALIZED 'TRUE', UPDATABLE 'TRUE', MATERIALIZED_TABLE 'StockJDGSource.StockCache', "teiid_rel:ALLOW_MATVIEW_MANAGEMENT" 'TRUE', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_SHARE_SCOPE" 'NONE', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_BEFORE_LOAD_SCRIPT" 'delete from StockJDGSource.StockCache;', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_STATUS_TABLE" 'Accounts.status', "teiid_rel:MATERIALIZED_STAGE_TABLE" 'StockJDGSource.StockCache', "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_TTL" 10000, "teiid_rel:MATVIEW_ONERROR_ACTION" 'WAIT') AS SELECT Stocks.Stock.product_id, Stocks.Stock.symbol, CAST(Stocks.Stock.price AS double) AS price, Stocks.Stock.company_name FROM Stocks.Stock;
